title: Enhancing Practical Competencies in E-Learning: Music Education Software Development for Strengthening Educational Applicability

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can write software functional specifications based on music education requirements.
Learners can implement three or more music education scenarios in VR/simulation environments.
Learners can improve prototypes by evaluating their educational applicability through teacher-developer collaboration.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
